comment: Professor King is extremely considerate when it comes to your time, one of the few times I've seen this in the Art Department. You have weeks to do your assignments, and he gives very clear instructions and feedback for your work. I only wish he wasn't so strict on attendance, but I can understand why he is. Overall great guy.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Very picky about attendance. First teacher in a college where he makes students sign in and out of his class. Getting a 90% in an as
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Professor King is a great professor! Although he is very laid back, he can be a bit strict on attendance, so make sure to show up if you can! His projects are not that difficult and he gives you plenty of time to work on them. He gives great feedback all throughout the process, and grades well.

Professor King is a very nice and understanding professor. He spaces his assignments out, so all though there are various assignments, they are all achievable. He tries his best to help every student understand the material at the pace they need. He is also always willing to answer questions, and provide helpful feedback both in and out of class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Best Professor I've ever had. He goes to extremes to explain everything thoroughly and is always extremely helpful when you have questions. He goes over everything slowly and cares if you understand correctly. He also has a great sense of humor and makes class fun. If you get the chance to take him do it! Very personable and an overall great man.
